title: ATypI Helsinki FontTech Forum
content:
The provisional schedule for this year's TypeTech Forum has been posted on the ATypI site...

[http://www.atypi.org/07\_Helsinki/30\_program/30\_other\_events/10\_typetech](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022023922/http:/www.atypi.org/07_Helsinki/30_program/30_other_events/10_typetech "http://www.atypi.org/07\_Helsinki/30\_program/30\_other\_events/10\_typetech")

Hope many Typohiles will be able to make it. There's still room on the schedule for additional speakers so if you have something interesting to talk about or demo please contact me directly via [simonda@microsoft.com](mailto:simonda@microsoft.com)

Cheers, Si
author: Si_Daniels

comments.content: Oh dear, they've forgotten how to spell your name, Si.

Uh oh. They've missed a talk off the list, and Tiffany now resolves to Adam. I'll get on to them.

Cheers, Si
